channel.title: Blogs on Seasalt.ai's SeaSuite Powers Contact Centers of the Future.

item.title: Discord (1/3): A New Frontier for Customer Engagement
item.description: Discord’s user numbers have soared in recent years and the platform has now rebranded itself as the ‘home for your communitites and friends’.

item.title: Ultimate Guide to Enabling Chat on Google Maps to Connect With Customers (with examples and steps to enable it)
item.description: Google Maps Chat is a great way for businesses to connect with customers.

item.title: Launch Your Virtual Agent on Google Maps With Near Me Messaging
item.description: We have previously introduced you to Near Me Messaging and its benefits.

item.title: Near Me Messaging Complements Google Business Messages
item.description: In one of our previous blogs, we walked you through the benefits and limitations of Google Business Messages.

item.title: Farewell Google My Business, Now Google Maps Is The New OS for Businesses
item.description: Directly connecting businesses with consumers through Google Maps provides a seamless experience for consumers’ shopping experience.

item.title: Business Owners: Use Google Business Messages to Engage During Off-hours!
item.description: Learn more about the benefits and limitations of Google Business Messages and how businesses implement Google Business Messages.

item.title: Business Owners: Don’t Miss Out Customers Messages on Google Maps!
item.description: In this article, we will walk you through Google Business Profile, its chat feature, and a way to avoid missing out on customers’ messages.

item.title: AI-Enabled Contact Center Automation: Virtual Agent Collaboration with CRM
item.description: Integrating HubSpot with SeaX Easy and seamless access to both your contact center interface and your customer data in a CRM is vital to efficient customer support.

item.title: From Demo to Success: Beyond Hardware (5/5)
item.description: Throughout this blog series, follow Seasalt.ai’s journey to creating a well rounded Modern Meetings Experience, starting with its humble beginnings, to optimizing our service on different hardware and models, to integrating state-of-the-art NLP systems and finally ending on the full realization of SeaMeet, our collaborative modern meeting solutions.

item.title: 8 Seasalt.ai Cloud Happy Hours This Summer: Failures and Successes
item.description: Seasalt.ai, a Conversational AI consulting startup, is built during the COVID-19 pandemic: we hired the first employee in March 2020 and most team members have never met each face to face.
